favourite.article: GOD because He fills all and in all, WORD because He is embodied in His word, LORD'S PEOPLE because He purchased us not with gold and silver but with His precious blood- with Himself. Praise the Lord for these three treasures which is the very person of the Triune God!
A short but wonderful Hymn. The Message is rich. Amen for the Church life.
This song is short but enjoyable, my treasure is my God!
